## Map with Points
```{r, markers}
city_temp <- read.csv("CitiesExt.csv")

pal311 <- colorFactor(c("#d73027", "#1a9850"), c("no", "yes"))

leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap.HOT") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(data = city_temp, lng = ~longitude, lat = ~latitude, radius = 1.5, color =  ~pal311(EU)) %>%
  addLegend(position = "topright" , pal = pal311, values = city_temp$EU, title = "EU?")
```
